description: This file contains prototype declarations for cryptographic utility functions related to prime and integer conversion, likely used in Asymmetric Cryptography with OpenSSL (SSLeay). It is part of a larger cryptographic library and defines interfaces for converting between custom prime/integer objects and BIGNUMs, as well as setting values from data buffers.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubPrime2BigNum
methods.description: Converts a PANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME structure to a BIGNUM object.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubInteger2BigNum
methods.description: Converts a PANSC_CRYPTO_INTEGER structure to a BIGNUM object.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubBigEndianInteger2Integer
methods.description: Converts a big-endian Integer representation to an internal integer structure.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubBigEndianPrime2Prime
methods.description: Converts a big-endian Prime representation to a Prime structure.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubBigNum2Integer
methods.description: Converts a BIGNUM to an internal integer structure.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubBigNum2Prime
methods.description: Converts a BIGNUM to a Prime structure.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubSetInteger
methods.description: Sets a PANSC_CRYPTO_INTEGER from raw data.

methods.name: AnscCryptoPubSetPrime
methods.description: Sets a PANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME from raw data.
